inclusion.criterion: Male or female patients with an age of 18 to 75 years
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Bilirubin level of 3 mg/dL or less (51.3 umol/L)
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Hepatocellular carcinoma or other intrahepatic/extrahepatic cancers.
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Previous or current portal venous system thrombosis.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Known coagulation disorder besides liver cirrhosis.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Peptic ulcer disease in the last 6 months.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Unstable angina or myocardial infarction (MI) within the past 6 months before randomization.
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has a history of variceal bleeding, but it is not clear if it was >5 days ago. He also has liver cirrhosis and ascites, which are both inclusion criteria.
